Uses of Interface
com.opengamma.strata.pricer.fx.BlackVolatilityFxProvider

  • Packages that use BlackVolatilityFxProvider 
    Package Description
    com.opengamma.strata.pricer.fx
    Calculators for FX instruments, such as FX forward and FX swap.

    • Uses of BlackVolatilityFxProvider in com.opengamma.strata.pricer.fx

      Classes in com.opengamma.strata.pricer.fx that implement BlackVolatilityFxProvider 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BlackVolatilityFlatFxProvider
      Data provider of volatility for FX options in the lognormal or Black-Scholes model.
      class  BlackVolatilitySurfaceFxProvider
      Data provider of volatility for FX options in the lognormal or Black-Scholes model.
